definition: rock cave/grotto/cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Shi
cave/hole
Longmen Grottoes at Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳[Luo4 yang2], Henan
Yungang Caves at Datong 大同, Shanxi 山西
Dunhuang caves in Gansu/refers to Mogao caves 莫高石窟[Mo4 gao1 shi2 ku1]

the four great caves, namely: Longmen Grottoes 龍門石窟|龙门石窟[Long2 men2 Shi2 ku1] at Luoyang, Henan, Yungang Caves 雲岡石窟|云冈石窟[Yun2 gang1 Shi2 ku1] at Datong, Shanxi, Mogao Caves 莫高窟[Mo4 gao1 ku1] at Dunhuang, Gansu, and Mt Maiji Caves 麥積山石窟|麦积山石窟[Mai4 ji1 Shan1 Shi2 ku1] at Tianshui, Gansu
Mt Maiji Caves at Tianshui 天水, Gansu

sentences.english: Department of East China 's largest grotto sculpture group.
sentences.chinese: 系我國東部最大的石窟造像羣。

sentences.english: The Kizil Grottoes were built one century early than the Mogao Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 克孜爾石窟營造年代早於敦煌莫高窟一個多世紀。

sentences.english: After the late Tang dynasty, there were no new grottos appeared in northern China.
sentences.chinese: 晚唐以後，北方中原已經沒有石窟造像作品出現。

sentences.english: Bingling Si Grotoes are 129 km southwest of Lanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 炳靈寺石窟在蘭州城西南129公里處。

sentences.english: Grotto art is for the people at that time Xinfo services.
sentences.chinese: 石窟藝術是爲當時信佛的人們服務的。

sentences.english: Danapati Bodhisattva, Tang dynasty, cave fresco, cave 401, Mogao grottoes, Dunhuang.
sentences.chinese: 供養菩薩，唐，石窟壁畫，敦煌莫高窟第401窟。

sentences.english: The story of vanquishing demons in Ludong is the only one in Longmen Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 路洞石窟降魔變是龍門石窟唯一的一鋪。

sentences.english: The story of vanquishing demons in Ludong is the only one in Longmen Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 路洞石窟降魔變是龍門石窟唯一的一鋪。

sentences.english: Dunhuang Grottoes is a history showing with image, including abundant subjects.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌石窟壁畫藝術包羅萬象，是一部形象的歷史。

sentences.english: We can see from this that initially the cave diggers aimed mainly at worshipping Buddha .
sentences.chinese: 可見，在敦煌開鑿石窟，開始時主要是宣傳佛教。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottoes are one of the three major treasure houses of stone carving in China.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟是中國三大石窟瑰寶之一。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottoes are one of the three major treasure houses of stone carving in China.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟是中國三大石窟瑰寶之一。

sentences.english: Characteristics and practical significance of The Illustrations of Moxibustion in Dunhuang Caves were studied and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 探討分析敦煌石窟《灸法圖》的特點及現實意義。

sentences.english: In the end, we investigated the historical role of the Xixia grottoes arts.
sentences.chinese: 第五，就西夏石窟藝術的歷史地位做了探討。

sentences.english: Cliff inscriptions of sutra in Longmen Grottoes were, as many as 19, all finished during the early Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟的摩崖刻經達19部之多，全部爲初唐所刻。

sentences.english: Starting from this point of view, the author expounded the Model of Qiuci Grotto art.
sentences.chinese: 全文從這種觀點出發，論述了龜茲石窟藝術模式。
